name: Site Establishment and Safety Checklist
Details
Delivery and goods lift location
Delivery requirements i.e. booking process
On site storage / office location
Site specific restrictions i.e. noise / starting times
Ductwork Checklist
Ductwork
Rectangular duct installed as per latest drawing
Duct flanges firmly bolted and sealed where required
Cleats installed as required
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed
DW insulated where required and damage free
Ductwork restrained for wind/seismic where required
Any required ductwork leakage testing
Pops & flex installed as per latest drawing
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed for flex
Free from support off other services
Flexible duct connections completed correctly
Blade dampers installed as documented and left in the open position
BD pop access panel coordinated and marked
Cushion boxes installed as per latest drawing
Balancing dampers installed as documented and left in the open position
Location of register coordinted with other services and marked on plan or floor
Photos of ductwork correctly sealed through smoke wall & smoke damper
Pipework Checklist
Pipework
Pipework installed as per latest drawings
Pipework installed level and free of damage
All joins welded / crimped as per manufacturer's instructions
Air bleeds installed in pipework where required
Riser or area branch valve access panel coordinated and marked
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed for pipe runs
No other services suspended from pipework
Pipework lagged where required and correct thickness
Pipework labelled
Pipework secitons though fire walls lagged as per test report
Correct hanger spacing / fall
Drain tested
Drain pump installed level and tested
Drain terminates at a tundish
Drains, pump and tundish access for maintenance.
Indoor Equipment Checklist
Indoor Equipment
Indoor Unit (IDU) correctly supported as per project engineering requirements
Correct IDU installed as per latest drawing
Flexible connections installed and sealed
Access to filter bank / filters installed
Access to all relevant controls and isolators
IDU access panel coordinated and marked
Ventilation fan correctly supported as per project engineering requirements
Correct fan installed as per latest drawing
Fan connections secured and sealed
Access to fan and isolator
Ventilation fan access panel coordinated and marked
Correct VAV installed as per latest drawing
Access to VAV and controls
VAV access panel coordinated and marked
Grille Fit-Off Checklist
Grille Fit-Off
Grilles installed in correct location as per latest duct layout / RCP
Correct grille type installed
Grille installed flush and square
Are all grilles installed correctly? Air leaks, vibration or failure
Grille color as per schedule
Grille left clean of fingerprints and caps installed where required
Grille fit-Off completed to drawings/specification & Area left clean/tidy (Any Issues comment below)
Refrigeration Pipe Checklist
Refrigeration Pipe
Correct IDU & ODU installed as per latest drawing & schedule
Installed as per latest drawings
No other services suspended from pipe work (Attach Photos below)
Installation damage free (Any Issues comment/attach Photos below)
Correct supports used and support spacing
Pipe labelled after insulation - provide photo evidence
Pipe mains installation completed to drawings/specification
Pipework system pressure tested
Area left clean and tidy - photos of cleanliness or issues

All Subbie Rough-in Progression
All work in zone completed and appear compliant
Pass once all work complete

All Subbie Fit off & Testing Progression
All work in zone completed and appear compliant

As Builts
Update As-Built's of any known changes
Fan Checklist
Fan
Fan installed as per latest drawing
Inspect the fan. Record and report for any issues
Fan is labelled clearly
Confirm ductwork connections to the fans are correct and include flexible connections
Confirm VSD is installed
Confirm test points, sensors and gauges have been provided and installed as documented
Confirm correct eletrical connections to the fan
Adequate maintenance clearance maintained
Unit complete with acoustic wrapping as per documented
Installed as per manufacturer's requirements. Refer to specific equipment schedule for detail.

Coil correctly supported as per project engineering requirements

Pipework installed level and free of damage
